GrossFloorArea.help: Specified in square meters, used for calculating the energy demand

FractionCommercial.help: A number from 0 to 1, specifying how large a share of the area which should be treated as commercial buildings, as opposed to residential. Used for calculating the pattern and quantity of energy demand

FractionSchool.help: A number from 0 to 1, specifying how large a share of the area which should be treated as school buildings, as opposed to residential. Used for calculating the pattern and quantity of energy demand

PVArea.help: Specified in square meters, indicating the total areal of solar panels that this agent has at its disposal

PVEfficiency.help: A number from 0 to 1, specifying the efficiency of solar panels that the agent may have at its disposal. If missing, will default to the default PV efficiency specified in 'AreaInfo'

NumberHeatPumps.help: Heat pumps allow the building agent to convert electricity into heating. Currently, all heat pumps are medium sized 'Thermia Mega 2020' pumps, with a maximum effect of 44 kW

COP.help: With this parameter, one can modify the relative Coefficient of Performance of the agent's heat pumps. The default is 4.6, which is the tabulated value for a medium sized 'Thermia Mega 2020' running on 3600 RPM, with a forward temperature of 35 degrees and a brine fluid temperature of 0 degrees Celsius

BatteryCapacity.help: A number specifying the storage capacity, in kWh

TransferRate.help: A number specifying (in kWh) the maximum amount of energy the agent can transfer into, or out from, the microgrid in an hour

PVArea.help: Specified in square meters, indicating the total areal of solar panels that this agent has at its disposal

PVEfficiency.help: A number from 0 to 1, specifying the efficiency of solar panels that the agent may have at its disposal. If missing, will default to the default PV efficiency specified in 'AreaInfo'

PVArea.help: Specified in square meters, indicating the total areal of solar panels that this agent has at its disposal

PVEfficiency.help: A number from 0 to 1, specifying the efficiency of solar panels that the agent may have at its disposal. If missing, will default to the default PV efficiency specified in 'AreaInfo'
